description: The FAQMaster AI fetches the X100 manual, extracts the factory‑reset section, summarizes the steps, generates a new FAQ entry and updates the public help page, then returns the concise instructions to the user.

messages.content: You are FAQMaster AI, an autonomous assistant that builds and updates FAQ pages by ingesting product documentation such as manuals, support tickets, and forum posts. Use the provided tools to retrieve, extract, summarize, generate FAQ content, and publish it.
I need to reset my X100 device to factory settings. How do I do that?
Sure, I’ll pull the reset instructions from the X100 manual and create a FAQ entry for you.
Extracting the relevant text from the manual.

...
4.4 Factory Reset
To restore the X100 to factory settings:
1. Power off the device.
2. Press and hold the reset button located on the back panel.
3. While holding the button, power the device back on.
4. Continue holding the button for 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
5. Release the button. The device will display "Factory Reset" on the screen and reboot.
6. After reboot, the device is restored to its original factory configuration.
...

chunks:
To restore the X100 to factory settings:
1. Power off the device.
2. Press and hold the reset button located on the back panel.
3. While holding the button, power the device back on.
4. Continue holding the button for 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
5. Release the button. The device will display "Factory Reset" on the screen and reboot.
6. After reboot, the device is restored to its original factory configuration.

messages.content: To factory reset the X100: 1) Power off the device. 2) Hold the reset button while turning the device back on. 3) Keep holding for 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. 4) Release the button; the screen will show “Factory Reset” and the device will reboot to its original settings.
Generating a new FAQ entry based on the summarized steps.

source_summaries: To factory reset the X100: 1) Power off the device. 2) Hold the reset button while turning the device back on. 3) Keep holding for 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly. 4) Release the button; the screen will show “Factory Reset” and the device will reboot to its original settings.

messages.content:
# Factory reset
**Q:** How do I reset my X100 to factory settings?
**A:**
1. Power off the X100.
2. Press and hold the reset button on the back panel.
3. While still holding the button, power the device back on.
4. Continue holding the button for about 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
5. Release the button. The screen will display “Factory Reset” and the device will reboot.
6. After the reboot, the X100 is restored to its original factory configuration.

If you encounter any issues, consult the troubleshooting section of the manual or contact support.
Updating the public FAQ page with the new entry.

arguments.faq_content:
# Factory reset
**Q:** How do I reset my X100 to factory settings?
**A:**
1. Power off the X100.
2. Press and hold the reset button on the back panel.
3. While still holding the button, power the device back on.
4. Continue holding the button for about 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
5. Release the button. The screen will display “Factory Reset” and the device will reboot.
6. After the reboot, the X100 is restored to its original factory configuration.

If you encounter any issues, consult the troubleshooting section of the manual or contact support.

messages.content: FAQ page for product X100 updated successfully (revision 42).

Here are the steps to reset your X100 to factory settings:
1. Power off the device.
2. Press and hold the reset button on the back panel.
3. While holding the button, turn the device back on.
4. Keep holding the button for about 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
5. Release the button. The screen will show “Factory Reset” and the device will reboot.
6. After reboot, the X100 is restored to its original factory configuration.

I’ve also added this information as a new FAQ entry on the X100 help site, so you and other users can find it easily in the future.
